p: Due to their being effective in inhibiting development and killing microorganisms, antibiotics are used as additives in silage processing [ 2]. However, the prohibiton of antibiotics to be used as additives has increased interest in natural products from aromatic plants and products of these plants to be used in food, animal nutrition. Although the microbial effect of plant extracts is recognized, there is limited research about these plants to be used as silage additive [ 3, 4, 5].
